name: Oil-Dri Corporation of America
description: Oil-Dri Corporation of America is a leading manufacturer of absorbent products derived from clay minerals, primarily known for its high-quality cat litter and industrial absorbents. Established in 1941, Oil-Dri has built a strong reputation in the consumer and industrial markets, providing innovative solutions for pet care, oil and grease absorption, and other applications. The company's flagship product, Cat's Pride, is one of the top-selling cat litters in the United States, recognized for its superior odor control and clumping properties. In addition to consumer products, Oil-Dri supplies various industrial sectors with absorbents used for cleaning up spills, managing hazardous materials, and improving workplace safety. The company's commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to utilize natural resources responsibly and to innovate in product development. Oil-Dri continues to expand its product lines and markets, aiming to meet the evolving needs of its customers while maintaining high standards of quality and environmental stewardship.
